data.doc:
# Objective
1. Deploy a markdown parser skill that will strip out the markdown tags from a document
2. Deploy a label skill that will generate the IOB tags for specific named entities based on seed data
## Build and Deploy the Markdown Skill
The markdown skill is a simple Azure Function that accepts the content of a markdown file and returns the text. 
### Build the Markdown Skill 
1. Open the Azure function app in the MarkdownSkill folder in Visual Studio Code
2. Build and run the skill locally
3. Test the skill with the [sample request](sample/markdown_req.json)
